attributes.action: bring in the death sentence to all sex offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These so called "people" cause agony for many people around the world. But sex offenders are being let off lightly due to the overcrowded prisons so they are walking the streets again ready to strike again within 5 years. This is happening more and more because there is no true deterant but this sentence may scare these "people" enough to think about what they are doing and the pain they cause.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
